description: A frothy espresso kick complete with chocolate drizzle and Ferrero Rocher, these espresso 'martini' mocktails are every bit as deluxe as the real deal.
name: Espresso 'Martini' Mocktails Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide coffee mixture between glasses. Sprinkle glasses with dark chocolate. Cut a small slit into Ferrero Rochers, then arrange 1 chocolate on rim of each glass. Serve immediately.
Divide coffee mixture between glasses. Sprinkle glasses with dark chocolate. Cut a small slit into Ferrero Rochers, then arrange 1 chocolate on rim of each glass. Serve immediately.
